title: Easy on Me, Snookums - Novel Updates
author: Wenxu Yiyi   温煦依依
description:
The day before her marriage, she witnessed her boyfriend and his prospective sister-in-law perform restricted drama in the office. When her heart was broken, a calm man appeared beside her.

“Marry me, so that their two shameless men and women will call you sister-in-law every day? How?”

In this way, got the certificate.

However, who would have thought that the husband who was originally in a wheelchair is not only incompetent, but also eats her up at every turn…>
